entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as having puffy, red and swollen eyes, indicating that he is grieving. He is also mentioned to be wiping his streaming eyes on the bottom of his shirt.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is described as a spider who was feared by Hagrid and others in the forest. It is mentioned that Aragog's body was difficult to remove from the forest due to its size.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as consoling Hagrid on the elbow, indicating a close relationship between them.

relationships.description: Hagrid fears Aragog and mentions that it was only on Aragog's orders that the other spiders did not eat him.
